description: VirtualMachineInstancePhaseTransitionTimestamp gives a timestamp in relation to when a phase is set on a vmi

phase.description: Phase is the status of the VirtualMachineInstance in kubernetes world. It is not the VirtualMachineInstance status, but partially correlates to it.

phaseTransitionTimestamp.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.
